title: Discussion Section with Kevin Murphy and Chad Syverson
description: In this episode, Murphy gets concrete with Chad Syverson, the J. Baum Harris Professor of Economics at Chicago Booth, about how his engineering background influences his approach to economics, understanding the drivers of productivity, how it is measured, and what can be gleaned from past growth trends in predicting what may come.
itunes:author: Becker Friedman Institute at UChicago
